Retailers Association of India wishes everyone a happy and prosperous Diwali🪔 

May this Diwali bring love & light into your lives✨

#HappyDiwali #DiwaliRetail #Diwali2022 #RAIforIndianRetail #RetailMatters #Retailer #Brand #OnlineRetail #RetailStores #RAI #RetailSales #DiwaliBusiness #DiwaliTime #ShopLocal #FestiveSeason #FestiveShopping #Topical

"User wants to ensure that you listen to their voice at whatever channel they are", says Lokesh Wagadre, AVP & Head - IT, Kaya Ltd. at #ReTechCon2022.

He also mentions how engagement & grievance addressal has become crucial to help consumers feel empowered and execute a successful conversational commerce strategy.

Click here to view the full discussion: bit.ly/ConversationalCommerce_ReTechCon2022 (Link in bio)

#RetailConversations #ConversationalCommerce #Commerce #OnlineCommerce #Ecommerce #Retail #RetailMarketing #Consumer #ConsumerBehaviour #ConsumerInsights #Retailers #OnlineShopping #RetailStores

"60% of shoppers today want instant interaction with their brands on their preferred channel", says Anila Rao, VP - APAC, Haptik at #ReTechCon2022.

She also sheds light on two important facets, instant interaction & preferred channels which are integral stepping stones to conversational commerce.

Click here to view the full discussion: bit.ly/ConversationalCommerce_ReTechCon2022 (Link in bio)

#RetailConversations #ConversationalCommerce #Commerce #OnlineCommerce #Ecommerce #Retail #RetailMarketing #Consumer #ConsumerBehaviour #ConsumerInsights #Retailers #OnlineShopping #RetailStores

#HarGharTiranga #AzadiKaAmritMahotsav #75IndependenceDay #MainBharatHoon #IndependenceDay #IndependenceDayIndia

The government of India announced a ban on the manufacture, import, distribution, and sale of certain single-use plastic items beginning 1 July 2022.

The items that will be prohibited are listed here:
https://bit.ly/PlasticBanFromJuly (Link in bio)

Members are encouraged to keep a printout of the list at their stores to avoid confusion among store employees about what is permitted and what isn't to avoid disciplinary action for noncompliance.

#RAIforIndianRetail #RetailMatters #Retailer #Brand #OnlineShopping #ShoppingExperience #OnlineRetail #RetailStores #RetailShop #RetailMarketing #RAI #RetailAssociationofIndia #PlasticBan #Plastic

#RAIforIndianRetail #RetailMatters #Retailer #Brand #OnlineShopping #OnlineRetail #RetailStores #RetailMarketing #RAI #Learning #Development #Insights

Modern retailers are leveraging the power of AI-driven Video Analytics to become more versatile, responsive, and consistent in their comprehension of the user experience.

Join us for an exclusive webinar on 'Retail Intelligence,' in which industry leaders such as Jaideep Jaiman, VP - Analytics & Digital, V-Mart, Sandeep Jabbal, Chief Digital Transformation & Information Officer, Shoppers Stop, Satish Panchapakesan, SVP & CIO, Arvind Fashions Ltd, Vinod Kapote, Head - IT, Trent Ltd, and Atul Rai, CEO & Co-Founder, Staqu - will discuss how AI-powered video analytics is assisting the retail industry's digitisation, moderated by Hitesh Bhatt, Director - Marketing and Communications, RAI.

Live now! https://youtu.be/I4_JMr-iPCU (Link in bio)

#AI #VideoAnalytics #RetailInnovation #Technology #RetailTechnology #Learning #Insights #RAIforIndianRetail #RetailMatters #OnlineRetail #RetailMarketing #CustomerExperience #Sales

Deepak Rogye, Ass. Manager-Merchandising & Shankar Hemrajani, Founder, Sweet Ginger share their experience of attending the fiber to textile workshop which was an inaugural success. The workshop gave them an in-depth view of how the garments are manufactured.

Want to know more about such workshops? Stay tuned!

#RAIforIndianRetail #RetailMatters #Retailer #Brand #RetailStores #RetailMarketing #RAI #Learning #Insights #Textile #Workshop #Training #RetailAssociationofIndia

Nandan Nilekani, Chairman and Co-Founder, Infosys and Founding Chairman UIDAI (Aadhaar), talks about the new developments that directly impact the retail sector. 

Want to learn more about what they are and how they impact the retail sector? Click here to view - https://bit.ly/AddressbyGuestofHonour-NandanNilekani (Link in bio)

latestPosts.caption:
We are excited to have Deepak Jain, CEO of amanté India and Sri Lanka - A Reliance Retail Group Company on the stage of RLS 2025!

With 21 years of work experience, Mr. Jain has been associated with esteemed organizations such as Diageo, UB, and Shaw Wallace, where he made significant contributions to business growth and brand elevation initiatives. A Chartered Accountant and an alumnus of IIM Bangalore, he successfully transitioned from a seasoned finance professional to the role of CEO of amanté. Under his leadership, the brand achieved unprecedented success, establishing itself as the premier choice for intimate wear across India and Sri Lanka.

We can't wait to hear Mr. Jain share his expertise at RLS 2025!

For More Details, Contact:

📞 Dr. Hitesh Bhatt - 09987343344 | 📧: hitesh@rai.net.in

🌐 Register Now: https://bit.ly/RLS-2025

latestPosts.caption:
Excited to announce Devang Sampat, Managing Director of Cinépolis India, as one of our speakers for Retail Leadership Summit 2025!

A visionary leader in the retail and multiplex industry, Mr. Sampat has been instrumental in shaping the growth of Cinépolis India since its inception 14 years ago. With a remarkable career spanning over 23 years, he has successfully driven the brand’s national expansion while seamlessly adapting international strategies for the Indian market.

Mr. Sampat’s expertise in understanding the evolving demands of Indian consumers and delivering exceptional customer experiences through innovative offerings sets him apart as a trailblazer in the industry. His leadership continues to elevate Cinépolis as a benchmark for excellence.

We are thrilled to have Mr. Sampat share his invaluable insights and journey at RLS 2025.

For More Details, Contact:

📞 Dr. Hitesh Bhatt - 09987343344 | Email: hitesh@rai.net.in

🌐 Enquire Now: https://www.rls.net.in/contact.php

The Retail Leadership Summit proudly welcomes Biju Kassim, CEO of Beauty at Shoppers Stop Ltd. for the 2025 edition!

Mr. Kassim has over 30 years of experience in the beauty industry across the Indian subcontinent, Middle East, and African markets. At Shoppers Stop, he has played a key role in shaping the brand’s beauty segment. With a deep understanding of the market, he has successfully expanded Shoppers Stop's beauty offerings, curating a diverse range of brands to meet every customer’s needs. Under Mr. Kassim’s leadership, Shoppers Stop Beauty has become a trusted name, known for delivering a seamless shopping experience with a strong focus on quality and customer care.

Don’t miss the opportunity to hear from such a seasoned leader in the industry, exclusively at RLS 2025!
